title: CVE-2015-3456 "VENOM" vulnerability
description: The VENOM (Virtualized Environment Neglected Operations Manipulation) vulnerability impacts popular virtualization platforms, including QEMU, Xen, KVM, and Oracle's VirtualBox. It consists in a buffer overflow condition in the FDC (Floppy Disk Controller) emulation code. Fortinet virtual appliances including FortiOS, FortiManager, FortiAnalyzer and any other product running on Hyper-V, Xen and KVM are not affected.

definitions.impact: Guest VM DoS and VM escape
